message:
"A Plano woman was sentenced to prison this week after admitting she brought a nanny from Africa to work for years without pay."
Domestic Servitude is a form of human trafficking that is often overlooked by the media. The sentence doesn't reflect the years of abuse the victim endured.

attachments.media_description: Plano nanny worked nonstop, slept on kids' floor in case of 'modern day slavery,' feds say
